org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel

Interface RedirectionTransport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRedirectionTransport

    public interface RedirectionTransport
    Transport for processing the Redirection response from server.
    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman

      void onRedirectionResponse(org.kaaproject.kaa.common.endpoint.gen.RedirectSyncResponse response)
